lenders.occupational_info:
Andrea connects entrepreneurs with their audience through compelling written messages. She writes for the web, advertising and brochures among other mediums. 

Andrea is a qualified life coach practising in Sydney, Australia. Using a wholistic approach she enables everyday people to live their life in freedom and meaningful expression. Andrea specialises in health and wellbeing and cites the 'school of life' as her most rewarding teacher.

Andrea also moonlights in project management and business consultancy. She has led a Sydney-based children's charity supporting the needs of children facing learning difficulties; produced a number of high profile events and gets a real buzz out of improving the way people work and play.

lenders.loan_because: Since 1983, I've really enjoyed growing my own technology consulting business. I learned the skills of managing a successful business from my Mother. I'd like others to have an opportunity to gain education, experience, and build a business of their own. As the economy in the United States continues to decline, I feel my money is safer being loaned in small amounts to people around the world. I'd rather my money be with an elderly woman who runs a small shop or herds sheep, than to be in some mutual fund or with some broker on Wall Street.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the director of the ResourcesForLife.com website and a full-time technology support specialist. I also help facilitate the Small House Society - an organization dedicated to promoting smaller and simpler living.

lenders.name: Anders
lenders.loan_because: Economic growth leads to so many positive things, including increased personal freedoms, cultural improvments and ultimately a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I set up, run and maintain an industrial printing press (~8 meters long, ~3 meters high).

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: So many people have helped me that I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study at a university

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: helping people start or expand their own businesses is a respectful and intelligent way to lend a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big arts centre, writing many of the flyers and brochures we make. We have big orchestras come to play and I put together the programmes we sell. I also play the cello and the flute in amateur orchestras.

lenders.name: Fredrik Eliasson
lenders.loan_because: I believe this form of entrepreneurial support is the best way to empower people and to incite a change towards something better
lenders.occupational_info: I'm helping companies to do the right thing and to do things right (simply put, and in that order)

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
it makes sense to help.
We should help when we can!
lenders.occupational_info: I help the sales people asnwer the technical questions there might be in a sales call.

lenders.name: Zoë
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the right to provide for themselves and their family and I think microfinance is a wonderful way of helping people to do so.

lenders.name: Paulette
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: Self employed organizer, declutterer!

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: It's so much better than just giving money away, for both parts. It can make a difference in other people's lives without paternalism, and it encourages entrepeneur rather than passive self-pity attitudes. It's things like this that really make the world go forward.

lenders.name: Cate
lenders.loan_because: "Be the change you wish to see in the world" ~Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I receive more than I give
lenders.occupational_info: Soy un curador del corazón

lenders.name: Moving up the Mountain
lenders.loan_because: I know the feeling in my own life of one person offering assistance, and when many like minds and good hearts with good intentions come together, we can empower people one life at a time.  It is possible! And with Kiva, we see our good intentions come to life!
lenders.occupational_info: The painting on my page is called "Moving up the Mountain" is about the dreams we hold inside, to make life better.  They come from our heart and spirits, our gifts and talents.  With belief and support we can each make small movements up our own mountains.  Fingers of light reach upwards, offering support of dreams, our collective dreams for a better life. May we all live well and fulfill our dreams!

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I love being a Kiva lender because I can invest in people all over the world.  I believe that people, if given the opportunity, can lift themselves up to help themselves, the community and their families.  Also, after the initial investment of cash, I can now just take the money being paid back and put it to work again with another loan.
